00036 cHMM::cHMM( const cHMM& original )      
00037 {
00038         m_numberStates          = original.m_numberStates;
00039         m_ptVocabulary          = original.m_ptVocabulary;
00040         m_vocabularySize        = original.m_vocabularySize;
00041         m_observationSize       = original.m_observationSize;
00042         m_meanProbabilityWeighted               = original.m_meanProbabilityWeighted;
00043         m_varianceProbabilityWeighted   = original.m_varianceProbabilityWeighted;
00044         
00045         if( original.isReady() )
00046         {
00047                 m_PI = new float [ m_numberStates ];
00048                 memcpy( m_PI, original.m_PI, m_numberStates*sizeof(float) );
00049 
00050                 m_A = new float* [ m_numberStates ];
00051                 m_B = new float* [ m_numberStates ];
00052                 for( unsigned int i=0; i<m_numberStates; i++ )
00053                 {
00054                         m_A[i] = new float [ m_numberStates ];
00055                         memcpy( m_A[i], original.m_A[i], m_numberStates*sizeof(float) );
00056 
00057                         m_B[i] = new float [ m_ptVocabulary->getSize() ];
00058                         memcpy( m_B[i], original.m_B[i], m_ptVocabulary->getSize()*sizeof(float) );
00059                 }
00060         }
00061         else
00062         {
00063                 m_PI = NULL;
00064                 m_A = NULL;
00065                 m_B = NULL;
00066         }
00067 }

00082 void cHMM::clear()
00083 {
00084         m_ptVocabulary = NULL;
00085 
00086         if( NULL != m_PI ){
00087                 delete [] m_PI; 
00088                 m_PI = NULL;
00089         }
00090 
00091         if( NULL != m_A )
00092         {
00093                 for( unsigned int i = 0; i<m_numberStates; i++ )
00094                 {
00095                         if( NULL != m_A[i] ){
00096                                 delete [] m_A[i];
00097                         }
00098                 }
00099                 delete [] m_A;
00100                 m_A = NULL;
00101         }
00102 
00103         if( NULL != m_B )
00104         {
00105                 for( unsigned int i = 0; i<m_numberStates; i++ )
00106                 {
00107                         if( NULL != m_B[i] ){
00108                                 delete [] m_B[i];
00109                         }
00110                 }
00111                 delete [] m_B;
00112                 m_B = NULL;
00113         } 
00114         m_numberStates = 0;
00115         m_vocabularySize = 0;
00116         m_observationSize = 0;
00117         m_meanProbabilityWeighted = 0.0f;
00118         m_varianceProbabilityWeighted = 0.0f;
00119 }

00126 bool cHMM::copy( const cHMM& original ) 
00127 {
00128         if( original.isReady() == false )
00129         {
00130                 return false;
00131         }
00132 
00133         clear();
00134         
00135         m_numberStates          = original.m_numberStates;
00136         m_ptVocabulary          = original.m_ptVocabulary;
00137         m_vocabularySize        = original.m_vocabularySize;
00138         m_observationSize       = original.m_observationSize;
00139         m_meanProbabilityWeighted               = original.m_meanProbabilityWeighted;
00140         m_varianceProbabilityWeighted   = original.m_varianceProbabilityWeighted;
00141 
00142         m_PI = new float [ m_numberStates ];
00143         memcpy( m_PI, original.m_PI, m_numberStates*sizeof(float) );
00144 
00145         m_A = new float* [ m_numberStates ];
00146         m_B = new float* [ m_numberStates ];
00147         for( unsigned int i=0; i<m_numberStates; i++ )
00148         {

00151 
00152                 m_B[i] = new float [ m_ptVocabulary->getSize() ];
00153                 memcpy( m_B[i], original.m_B[i], m_ptVocabulary->getSize()*sizeof(float) );
00154         }
00155 
00156         return true;

00165 bool cHMM::load( const char* fileName ) 
00166 {
00167         if( !fileName ) {
00168                 return false;
00169         }
00170 
00171         std::ifstream file;
00172         file.open( fileName, std::ios::in | std::ios::binary );
00173         
00174         if( file.is_open() == false ) {
00175                 return false; 
00176         }
00177 
00178         // Check if binary with the header
00179         {       
00180                 char buffer[3];
00181 
00182                 std::streampos pos = file.tellg();
00183                 file.read( buffer, 3 );
00184                 if( 0 == memcmp( buffer, AGR_HMM_BIN_FILE_HEADER, 3 ) )
00185                 {
00186                         // binary
00187                         file.seekg( pos );
00188                         bool ret = loadBinary( file );
00189                         file.close();
00190                         return ret;                     
00191                 }
00192         }
00193 
00194         // The file is in ASCII format (or any other bad format)
00195         file.close();                   // close the file in binary format...
00196         file.open( fileName );  // ... to reopen it in ascii format
00197 
00198         bool ret = loadASCII( file );
00199         file.close();
00200         return ret;
00201 }

00209 bool cHMM::save( const char* fileName,  
00210                              const bool binary          
00211                                  ) const
00212 {
00213         // Check input
00214         if( NULL == fileName ) {
00215                 return false;
00216         }
00217 
00218         // Only save ready HMM
00219         if( isReady() == false ) {
00220                 return false;
00221         }
00222 
00223         if( binary )
00224         {
00225                 std::ofstream file;
00226                 file.open( fileName, std::ios::out | std::ios::binary );
00227                 bool ret = saveBinary( file );
00228                 file.close();
00229                 return ret;
00230         }
00231         else 
00232         {
00233                 std::ofstream file;
00234                 file.open( fileName );
00235                 bool ret = saveASCII( file );
00236                 file.close();
00237                 return ret;
00238         }
00239 }

00267 {
00268         if( NULL == m_A                         ||
00269                 NULL == m_B                             ||
00270                 NULL == m_PI                    ||
00271                 NULL == m_ptVocabulary  ||
00272                 0 == m_numberStates )
00273         {
00274                 return false;

00288                 0 == nbHiddenStates )

00300 
00308 float cHMM::forward( const cMovement& movement, 
00309                                          unsigned int normaliseSize     
00310                                          ) const
00311 {
00312         // Check initialisation
00313         if( isReady() == false )
00314         {
00315                 return -1.0f;
00316         }
00317         
00318 
00319         if( 0 == normaliseSize )
00320         {
00321                 if( m_observationSize > 0 ) 
00322                 {
00323                         normaliseSize = m_observationSize;
00324                 }
00325                 else
00326                 {
00327                         normaliseSize = movement.getSize();
00328                         if( 0 == normaliseSize ) {
00329                                 return false;
00330                         }
00331                 }
00332         }
00333 
00334         // Convert the observation sequence to a normalised and vocabulary clusterised one
00335         unsigned int* observationClusters = new unsigned int [normaliseSize] ;
00336 
00337         // Normalised and clusterised observation sequence creation
00338         computeObservationSequence( movement, observationClusters, normaliseSize );
00339 
00340         // Compute the probability
00341         float prob = forwardClusterised( observationClusters, normaliseSize );
00342 
00343         delete [] observationClusters;
00344 
00345         return prob;
00346 }

00349 
00355 float cHMM::forwardClusterised( const unsigned int* observation,        
00356                                                                 const unsigned int observationSize      
00357                                                                 ) const
00358 {
00359         // Check initialisation
00360         if( isReady() == false )
00361         {
00362                 return -1.0f;
00363         }
00364 
00365         // 1) Create the alpha buffer
00366         // 2) Compute the alpha buffer (forward algo)
00367         // 3) Compute the probability
00368 
00369         float** alpha; 
00370 
00371         // 1)
00372         alpha = new float* [ m_numberStates ];
00373         for( unsigned int i=0; i<m_numberStates; i++ )
00374         {
00375                 alpha[i] = new float [ observationSize ];
00376         }
00377 
00378 
00379         // 2)
00380         computeAlpha( alpha, observation, observationSize );
00381 
00382         // 3)
00383         float prob = 0;
00384         for( unsigned int i=0; i<m_numberStates; i++ )
00385         {
00386                 prob += alpha[ i ][ observationSize-1 ];
00387         }
00388 
00389         // cleaning
00390         for( unsigned int i=0; i<m_numberStates; i++ ){
00391                 delete [] alpha[i];
00392         }
00393         delete [] alpha;
00394 
00395         return prob;
00396 }

00399 
00407 bool cHMM::BaumWelch( const cMovement* movementArray,           
00408                                           const unsigned int nbMovement,                
00409                                           unsigned int sizeObservation )                
00410 {
00411         // Check inputs
00412         if( NULL == movementArray       ||
00413                 0 == nbMovement                 )
00414         {
00415                 return false;
00416         } 
00417 
00418         // Check initialisation
00419         if( isReady() == false ) {
00420                 return false;
00421         }
00422 
00423         if( 0 == sizeObservation )
00424         {
00425                 if( m_observationSize == 0 ) {
00426                         return false;
00427                 }
00428                 sizeObservation = m_observationSize;
00429         }
00430 
00431         cMovement movResized ;
00432         movResized.initialise( sizeObservation );
00433         unsigned int** obsClusters = new unsigned int* [ nbMovement ];
00434         for( unsigned int i=0; i<nbMovement; i++ )
00435         {
00436                 obsClusters[i] = new unsigned int [sizeObservation];
00437                 cMovement::changeVectorSize( movementArray[i], sizeObservation, &movResized );
00438                 m_ptVocabulary->clusterise( movResized, obsClusters[i] );
00439         }
00440 
00441         bool res = BaumWelchClusterised( obsClusters, nbMovement, sizeObservation );
00442 
00443         for( unsigned int i=0; i<nbMovement; i++ )
00444         {
00445                 delete [] obsClusters[i];
00446         }
00447         delete [] obsClusters;
00448 
00449         return res;
00450 }

00453 
00457 bool cHMM::BaumWelchClusterised( unsigned int** observationArray,               
00458                                                                  const unsigned int nbObservation,              
00459                                                                  const unsigned int sizeObservation )   
00460 {
00461         // Check inputs
00462         if( NULL == observationArray    ||
00463                 0 == nbObservation                      ||
00464                 0 == sizeObservation            )
00465         {
00466                 return false;
00467         }
00468 
00469         // Check initialisation
00470         if( isReady() == false )
00471         {
00472                 return false;
00473         }
00474 
00475         // check coherance with the vocabulary object
00476         if(  m_ptVocabulary->getSize() != m_vocabularySize )
00477         {
00478                 return false;
00479         }
00480 
00481         // Necessary variables
00482         float**  alpha;         // Forward's alpha
00483         float**  beta;          // Backward's beta
00484         float**  new_PIs;       // new PI values, for each observation
00485         float*** new_As;        // new A values, for each observation
00486         float*** new_Bs;        // new B values, for each observation
00487 
00488         // Create these values
00489 
00490         alpha = new float* [ m_numberStates ];
00491         beta  = new float* [ m_numberStates ];
00492         for( unsigned int i=0; i<m_numberStates; i++ )
00493         {
00494                 alpha[i] = new float [ sizeObservation ];
00495                 beta[i]  = new float [ sizeObservation ];
00496         }
00497 
00498         new_PIs = new float* [ nbObservation ];
00499         new_As = new float** [ nbObservation ];
00500         new_Bs = new float** [ nbObservation ];
00501 
00502         for( unsigned int obs = 0; obs< nbObservation; obs++ )
00503         {
00504                 new_PIs[obs] = new float [ m_numberStates ];
00505 
00506                 new_As[obs] = new float* [ m_numberStates ];
00507                 new_Bs[obs] = new float* [ m_numberStates ];
00508                 for( unsigned int i=0; i<m_numberStates; i++ )
00509                 {
00510                         new_As[obs][i] = new float [ m_numberStates ];
00511                         new_Bs[obs][i] = new float [ m_ptVocabulary->getSize() ];
00512                 }
00513         }
00514 
00515 
00516         // convergence loop - for the moment, only done once
00517         bool finished = false;
00518         while( !finished )
00519         {
00520                 
00521                 //*************************
00522                 // Compute the new values
00523 
00524                 for( unsigned int obs = 0; obs< nbObservation; obs++ )
00525                 {
00526                         computeAlpha( alpha, observationArray[ obs ], sizeObservation );
00527                         computeBeta ( beta,  observationArray[ obs ], sizeObservation );
00528 
00529                         // Pi
00530                         for( unsigned int i=0; i<m_numberStates; i++) 
00531                         {
00532                                 new_PIs[obs][ i ] = computeGamma( i, 0, alpha, beta );
00533                         }
00534 
00535                         // A
00536                         for( unsigned int i=0; i<m_numberStates; i++) 
00537                         {
00538                                 for( unsigned int j=0; j<m_numberStates; j++) 
00539                                 {
00540                                         float numerator = 0.0f;
00541                                         float denomerator = 0.0f;
00542 
00543                                         for( unsigned int t=0; t<sizeObservation-2; t++ )
00544                                         {
00545                                                 numerator += computeXi( i, j, t, alpha, beta, observationArray[obs] );
00546 
00547                                                 for( unsigned int h=0; h<m_numberStates; h++ )
00548                                                 {
00549                                                         denomerator += computeXi( i, h, t, alpha, beta, observationArray[obs] );
00550                                                 }
00551                                         }
00552 
00553                                         if( denomerator == 0 ){
00554                                                 new_As[obs][i][j] = 0;
00555                                         }
00556                                         else {
00557                                                 new_As[obs][i][j] = numerator/denomerator;
00558                                         }
00559 
00560                                 } // for j
00561                         } // for i
00562 
00563                         // B
00564                         for( unsigned int i=0; i<m_numberStates; i++)
00565                         {
00566                                 for( unsigned int k=0; k<m_ptVocabulary->getSize(); k++) 
00567                                 {
00568                                         float num = 0.0f;
00569                                         float denom = 0.0f;
00570 
00571                                         for( unsigned int t=0; t<sizeObservation; t++ )
00572                                         {
00573                                                 float interDenom = computeGamma( i, t, alpha, beta );
00574                                                 if( observationArray[obs][t] == k ){
00575                                                         num += interDenom;
00576                                                 }
00577                                                 denom += interDenom;
00578                                         }
00579                                         if( denom == 0 ){
00580                                                 new_Bs[obs][i][k] = 0;
00581                                         }
00582                                         else{
00583                                                 new_Bs[obs][i][k] = num / denom;
00584                                         }
00585 
00586                                 } // for j
00587                         } // for i
00588                         
00589                 } // for each observation
00590 
00591                 //*************************
00592                 // copy the new values in the HMM buffers
00593 
00594                 // zero values
00595 
00596                 memset( m_PI, 0x00, sizeof(float)*m_numberStates );
00597                 for( unsigned int i=0; i<m_numberStates; i++ ) 
00598                 {
00599                         memset( m_A[i], 0x00, sizeof(float)*m_numberStates );
00600                         memset( m_B[i], 0x00, sizeof(float)*m_ptVocabulary->getSize() );
00601                 }
00602 
00603                 // add values
00604                 for( unsigned int obs = 0; obs<nbObservation; obs++ )
00605                 {
00606                         for( unsigned int i=0; i<m_numberStates; i++) 
00607                         {
00608                                 m_PI[ i ] += new_PIs[obs][ i ];
00609                                 
00610                                 for( unsigned int j=0; j<m_numberStates; j++ )
00611                                 {
00612                                         m_A[i][j] += new_As[obs][i][j];
00613                                 }
00614 
00615                                 for( unsigned int j=0; j<m_ptVocabulary->getSize(); j++ )
00616                                 {
00617                                         m_B[i][j] += new_Bs[obs][i][j];
00618                                 }
00619                         }
00620                 }
00621         
00622                 // computing the average
00623                 for( unsigned int i=0; i<m_numberStates; i++)
00624                 {
00625 
00626                         //---- PI ----
00627                 m_PI[ i ] /= nbObservation;
00628 
00629                         // TEST : in order to increase results
00630                 m_PI[ i ] *= 1.01f;
00631                         if( m_PI[i] < 0.01f )
00632                                 m_PI[i] = 0.01f;
00633                         if( m_PI[i] > 1 )
00634                                 m_PI[i] = 1;
00635                         
00636                         //---- A ----
00637                         for( unsigned int j=0; j<m_numberStates; j++ )
00638                         {
00639                                 m_A[i][j] /= nbObservation;
00640                                 
00641                                 // TEST : in order to increase results
00642                                 m_A[i][j] *= 1.01f;
00643                                 if( m_A[i][j] < 0.001f )
00644                                         m_A[i][j] = 0.001f;
00645                                 if( m_A[i][j] > 1 )
00646                                         m_A[i][j] = 1;
00647                         }
00648 
00649                         //---- B ----
00650                         for( unsigned int j=0; j<m_ptVocabulary->getSize(); j++ )
00651                         {
00652                                 m_B[i][j] /= nbObservation;
00653                                 
00654                                 // TEST : in order to increase results
00655                                 m_B[i][j] *= 1.01f;
00656                                 if( m_B[i][j] < 0.001f )
00657                                         m_B[i][j] = 0.001f;
00658                                 if( m_B[i][j] > 1 )
00659                                         m_B[i][j] = 1;
00660                         }
00661                 } // average computing
00662 
00663                 finished = true; // Only once for the moment
00664 
00665         } // while( !finished )
00666 
00667         //*****************
00668         // cleaning the memory used for the Baum Welch algorithm
00669         
00670         for( unsigned int i=0; i<m_numberStates; i++ )
00671         {
00672                 delete [] alpha[i];
00673                 delete [] beta[i];
00674         }
00675         delete [] alpha;
00676         delete [] beta;
00677 
00678 
00679         for( unsigned int obs = 0; obs< nbObservation; obs++ )
00680         {
00681                 for( unsigned int i=0; i<m_numberStates; i++ )
00682                 {
00683                         delete [] new_As[obs][i];
00684                         delete [] new_Bs[obs][i];
00685                 }
00686                 delete [] new_As[obs];
00687                 delete [] new_Bs[obs];
00688                 delete [] new_PIs[obs];
00689         }
00690         delete [] new_PIs;
00691         delete [] new_As;
00692         delete [] new_Bs;
00693 
00694         
00695         //*****************
00696         // Compute the new mean and variance
00697 
00698         computeMeanVariance( observationArray, nbObservation, sizeObservation );
00699 
00700         return true;
00701 }
00702 
00703 
00704 
00716 bool cHMM::createHMM( cClustering* clusterer,                   
00717                                           const cMovement* movementArray,       
00718                                           const unsigned int nbMovement )       
00719 {
00720         // Check inputs
00721         if( NULL == clusterer           ||
00722                 NULL == movementArray   ||
00723                 0 == nbMovement                 )
00724         {
00725                 return false;
00726         }
00727 
00728         // Check initialisation
00729         if( NULL == m_ptVocabulary ||
00730                 0 == m_numberStates )
00731         {
00732                 return false;
00733         }
00734 
00735         if( m_ptVocabulary->isReady() == false ) {
00736                 return false;
00737         }
00738         m_vocabularySize = m_ptVocabulary->getSize();
00739 
00740         // Create the cluster in a temporary buffer
00741         cVector3int* statesClusters = new cVector3int[ m_numberStates ];
00742         clusterer->initialise( m_numberStates, statesClusters );
00743         clusterer->createClusters( movementArray, nbMovement );
00744 
00745         // Create data : normalised version of the observations and their average vector (AV)
00746         cMovement* normalisedMovArray = new cMovement[ nbMovement ];
00747         cMovement averageMovement;
00748         cMovement allPoints;
00749         bool res = cClustering::createNormalisedVectors( movementArray, nbMovement, &normalisedMovArray,
00750                                                                                                          &averageMovement, &allPoints, &m_observationSize );
00751         if( false == res )
00752         {
00753                 delete [] normalisedMovArray;
00754                 delete [] statesClusters;
00755                 return false;
00756         }
00757 
00758         //*******************
00759         // PI
00760 
00761         // Pi creation
00762         m_PI = new float [ m_numberStates ];
00763         memset( m_PI, 0x00, m_numberStates*sizeof(float) );
00764 
00765         // Pi initial value
00766         {
00767                 int clusterId;
00768                 cVector3int point;
00769 
00770                 // the observation vectors points
00771                 for( unsigned int i=0; i<nbMovement; i++ )
00772                 {
00773                         point = movementArray[i].getData(0);
00774                         clusterId = clusterer->closerCluster( point );
00775                         m_PI[ clusterId ]++;
00776                 }
00777 
00778                 // the average vector
00779                 point = averageMovement.getData(0);
00780                 clusterId = clusterer->closerCluster( point );
00781                 m_PI[ clusterId ]++;
00782 
00783                 for( unsigned int i=0; i<m_numberStates; i++ )
00784                 {
00785                         m_PI[ i ] /= (nbMovement+1);
00786                 }
00787         }
00788 
00789         
00790         //*******************
00791         // A : Transition probability matrix
00792 
00793         m_A = new float* [ m_numberStates ];
00794 
00795         for( unsigned int i=0; i<m_numberStates; i++ ) 
00796         {
00797                 m_A[i] = new float [ m_numberStates ];
00798                 for( unsigned int j=0; j<m_numberStates; j++ )
00799                 {
00800                         float count = 0;
00801                         float total_count = 0;
00802                         unsigned int clusterIdT0;
00803                         unsigned int clusterIdT1;
00804 
00805                         for( unsigned int v=0; v<nbMovement; v++ ) // go throught each normalised vector
00806                         {
00807                                 for( unsigned int p=0 ; p < normalisedMovArray[v].getSize()-1 ; p++ ) // go throught each point
00808                                 {
00809                                         clusterIdT0 = clusterer->closerCluster( normalisedMovArray[v].getData(p) );
00810                                         clusterIdT1 = clusterer->closerCluster( normalisedMovArray[v].getData(p+1) );
00811                                         if( clusterIdT0 == i  )
00812                                         {
00813                                                 total_count++;
00814                                                 if( clusterIdT1 == j ){
00815                                                         count++;
00816                                                 }
00817                                         }
00818 
00819                                 } // for p (vector points)
00820 
00821                                 clusterIdT0 = clusterer->closerCluster( normalisedMovArray[v].getData(normalisedMovArray[v].getSize()-1) );
00822                                 if( clusterIdT0 == i  )
00823                                 {
00824                                         total_count++;
00825                                 }
00826 
00827                                 if( total_count == 0 )
00828                                         m_A[i][j] = 0;
00829                                 else
00830                                         m_A[i][j] = count/total_count;
00831 
00832                                 if( m_A[i][j] == 0 )
00833                                         m_A[i][j] = 0.001f;     // TEST, for not having zeros probabilites values
00834 
00835                         }       // for v (normalised vector)
00836 
00837                 }       // for j
00838         }       //  for i
00839 
00840         //*******************
00841         // B : Emmision probability
00842 
00843         // necessary buffers
00844         unsigned int nbPoint = allPoints.getSize();
00845         unsigned int* assignedClusterHmm = new unsigned int [ nbPoint ];        // vocabulary points are assigned to
00846         unsigned int* assignedClusterVoc = new unsigned int [ nbPoint ];        // Hmm state points are assigned to
00847         clusterer->clusterise( allPoints, assignedClusterHmm );
00848         m_ptVocabulary->clusterise( allPoints, assignedClusterVoc );
00849         unsigned int vocabularySize = m_ptVocabulary->getSize();
00850 
00851         m_B = new float* [ m_numberStates ];
00852 
00853         for( unsigned int i=0; i<m_numberStates; i++ ) 
00854         {
00855                 m_B[i] = new float [ vocabularySize ];
00856 
00857                 for( unsigned int j=0; j<vocabularySize; j++ )
00858                 {
00859                         m_B[ i ][ j ] = 0;
00860                 }
00861                 float total_count = 0;
00862 
00863 
00864                 // for each point
00865                         // if the point is assigned to the current HMM state
00866                                 // find the vocabulary assigned and B[i][ assigned ]++ it
00867                                 // total_count ++;
00868                 for( unsigned int p=0; p<nbPoint; p++ )
00869                 {
00870                         if( assignedClusterHmm[p] == i )
00871                         {
00872                                 m_B[ i ][ assignedClusterVoc[p] ] ++;
00873                                 total_count ++;
00874                         }
00875                 }
00876 
00877                 // for each vocabulary v
00878                         // B[i][ j ] /= total_count
00879                 for( unsigned int v=0; v<vocabularySize; v++ )
00880                 {
00881                         m_B[ i ][ v ] /= total_count;
00882 
00883                         if( m_B[ i ][ v ] == 0 )
00884                                 m_B[ i ][ v ] = 0.001f; // TEST, for not having zeros probabilites values
00885                 }
00886 
00887         }       //  for i
00888 
00889         // cleaning m_B processing data
00890         delete [] assignedClusterHmm;
00891         delete [] assignedClusterVoc;
00892 
00893         
00894         //*******************
00895         // Mean and variance
00896 
00897         cMovement movResized ;
00898         movResized.initialise( m_observationSize );
00899         unsigned int** obsClusters = new unsigned int* [ nbMovement ];
00900         for( unsigned int i=0; i<nbMovement; i++ )
00901         {
00902                 obsClusters[i] = new unsigned int [ m_observationSize ];
00903                 cMovement::changeVectorSize( movementArray[i], m_observationSize, &movResized );
00904                 m_ptVocabulary->clusterise( movResized, obsClusters[i] );
00905         }
00906         computeMeanVariance( obsClusters, nbMovement, m_observationSize );
00907 
00908 
00909         //*******************
00910         // Cleaning
00911 
00912         for( unsigned int i=0; i<nbMovement; i++ ) {            
00913                 delete [] obsClusters[i];
00914         }
00915         delete [] obsClusters;
00916 
00917         delete [] normalisedMovArray;
00918         delete [] statesClusters;
00919         clusterer->clear();
00920 
00921         return true;
00922 }
00923 
00924 
00925 
00928 void cHMM::computeObservationSequence( const cMovement& movement,               
00929                                                                            unsigned int* observation,           
00930                                                                            const unsigned int normaliseSize     
00931                                                                            ) const
00932 {
00933         cMovement movResized;
00934         const cMovement* ptMovement = &movement;
00935 
00936         if( 0 != normaliseSize &&
00937                 movement.getSize() != normaliseSize )
00938         {
00939                 movResized.initialise( movement.getSize() );
00940                 cMovement::changeVectorSize( movement, normaliseSize, &movResized );
00941                 ptMovement = &movResized;
00942         }
00943         
00944         for( unsigned int i=0; i<normaliseSize; i++ )
00945         {
00946                 observation[i] = m_ptVocabulary->closerCluster( ptMovement->getData(i) );
00947         }
00948 }
00949 
00950 
00951 //****************
00952 // Protected
00953 
00954 
00957 void cHMM::computeAlpha( float** alpha,                                         
00958                                                  const unsigned int* observation,       
00959                                                  const unsigned int observationSize 
00960                                                  ) const
00961 {
00962         // For time 0
00963         for( unsigned int i=0; i<m_numberStates; i++ )
00964         {
00965                 alpha[i][0] = m_PI[i] * m_B[i][ observation[0] ] ;
00966         }
00967 
00968         for( unsigned int t=1; t<observationSize; t++ )
00969         {
00970                 for( unsigned int i=0; i<m_numberStates; i++ )
00971                 {
00972                         float sum = 0;
00973                         for( unsigned int j=0; j<m_numberStates; j++ )
00974                         {
00975                                 sum += alpha[j][t-1] * m_A[j][i];
00976                         }
00977                         float value = sum * m_B[i][ observation[t] ];
00978                         alpha[i][t] = value;
00979                 }
00980         }
00981 }
00982 
00983 
00984 
00987 void cHMM::computeBeta( float** beta,                                           
00988                                                 const unsigned int* observation,        
00989                                                 const unsigned int observationSize      
00990                                                 ) const
00991 {
00992         // For time 0
00993         for( unsigned int i=0; i<m_numberStates; i++ )
00994         {
00995                 beta[ i ][ observationSize-1 ] = 1.0f;
00996         }
00997 
00998         for( int t=observationSize-2; t>=0; t-- )
00999         {
01000                 for( unsigned int i=0; i<m_numberStates; i++ )
01001                 {
01002                         float sum = 0;
01003                         for( unsigned int j=0; j<m_numberStates; j++ )
01004                         {
01005                                 sum += m_A[i][j] * m_B[j][ observation[t+1] ] * beta[j][t+1];
01006                         }
01007                         beta[i][t] = sum;
01008                 }
01009         }
01010 }
01011 
01012 
01013 
01017 float cHMM::computeGamma( const unsigned int state,             
01018                                                   const unsigned int time,              
01019                                                   float** alpha,                                
01020                                                   float** beta                                  
01021                                                   ) const
01022 {
01023         float numerator = alpha[state][time] * beta[state][time];
01024         float denominator = 0.0f;
01025 
01026         for( unsigned int i=0; i<m_numberStates; i++ )
01027         {
01028                 denominator += alpha[i][time] * beta[i][time];
01029         }
01030 
01031         if( denominator == 0 )
01032                 return 0;
01033 
01034         return numerator / denominator;
01035 }
01036 
01037 
01038 
01042 float cHMM::computeXi( const unsigned int state1,               
01043                                            const unsigned int state2,           
01044                                            const unsigned int time,                     
01045                                            float** alpha,                                       
01046                                            float** beta,                                        
01047                                            const unsigned int* observation      
01048                                            ) const
01049 {
01050         float numerator =       alpha[ state1 ][ time ] * 
01051                                                 m_A  [ state1 ][ state2 ] * 
01052                                                 m_B  [ state2 ][ observation[time+1] ] *
01053                                                 beta [ state2 ][ time+1 ];
01054 
01055         float denominator = 0.0f;
01056         for( unsigned int i=0; i<m_numberStates; i++ )
01057         {
01058                 denominator += alpha[i][time] * beta[i][time];
01059         }
01060 
01061         if( denominator == 0 )
01062                 return 0;
01063 
01064         return numerator / denominator;
01065 }
01066 
01067 
01068 
01076 bool cHMM::computeMeanVariance( unsigned int** observationArray,                
01077                                                                 const unsigned int nbObservation,               
01078                                                             const unsigned int sizeObservation )        
01079 {
01080         if( NULL == observationArray    ||
01081                 0    == nbObservation           )
01082         {
01083                 return false;
01084         }
01085 
01086         float* probArry = new float [ nbObservation ];
01087 
01088         m_meanProbabilityWeighted = 0.0f;
01089         for( unsigned int i = 0; i< nbObservation; i++ )
01090         {
01091                 probArry[ i ] = sizeObservation * forwardClusterised(  observationArray[ i ], sizeObservation );
01092                 m_meanProbabilityWeighted += probArry[ i ];
01093         }
01094         m_meanProbabilityWeighted /= nbObservation;
01095 
01096         m_varianceProbabilityWeighted = 0.0f;
01097         for( unsigned int i = 0; i< nbObservation; i++ )
01098         {
01099                 probArry[ i ] -= m_meanProbabilityWeighted;             //   prob(i) - mean
01100                 probArry[ i ] *= probArry[ i ];                                 // ( prob(i) - mean )^2
01101                 m_varianceProbabilityWeighted += probArry[ i ];
01102         }
01103         m_varianceProbabilityWeighted /= nbObservation;
01104         m_varianceProbabilityWeighted = std::sqrt( m_varianceProbabilityWeighted );
01105 
01106         // The variance will be increased by 50% when doing tests
01107         // Therefore, we need to make sure that this won't return a negative probability
01108         while( m_varianceProbabilityWeighted * 1.5f >= m_meanProbabilityWeighted )
01109         {
01110                 m_varianceProbabilityWeighted *= 0.95f;
01111         }
01112 
01113         // clean
01114         delete [] probArry;
01115 
01116         return true;
01117 }

01120 
01125 bool cHMM::loadASCII( std::ifstream& file )
01126 {
01127         if( file.is_open() == false ) {
01128                 return false;
01129         }
01130 
01131         // version checking
01132         unsigned int version;
01133         char str[100];
01134         file >> str >> str >> str >> str >> version;
01135         if( version != AGR_HMM_ASCII_FILE_VERSION )
01136         {
01137                 // TODO : backward compatibility
01138                 return false;
01139         }
01140         file.getline( str, 100, '\n' ); // EOL
01141 
01142         // The previous vocabulary object pointed is saved and reassigned,
01143         // in case the user assign the vocabulary object before loading the file
01144         const cVocabulary* prevVocabulary = m_ptVocabulary;
01145 
01146         // clean HMM values
01147         clear();
01148         m_ptVocabulary = prevVocabulary;
01149 
01150         // Skip file info
01151         file.getline( str, 100, '\n' );
01152 
01153         // Nb States
01154         file >> str;
01155         file >> m_numberStates;
01156         file.getline( str, 100, '\n' ); // EOL
01157 
01158         // Observation size
01159         file >> str;
01160         file >> m_observationSize;
01161         file.getline( str, 100, '\n' ); // EOL
01162 
01163         // Mean
01164         file >> str;
01165         file >> m_meanProbabilityWeighted;
01166         file.getline( str, 100, '\n' ); // EOL
01167 
01168         // Variance
01169         file >> str;
01170         file >> m_varianceProbabilityWeighted;
01171         file.getline( str, 100, '\n' ); // EOL
01172 
01173         // Vocabulary size
01174         file >> str >> str >> str >> str >> str >> str >> m_vocabularySize;
01175         file.getline( str, 100, '\n' ); // EOL
01176         if( 0 == m_vocabularySize ) {
01177                 return false;
01178         }
01179 
01180         // Skip file info
01181         file.getline( str, 100, '\n' ); // empty line
01182         file.getline( str, 100, '\n' ); // PI info
01183 
01184         // PI
01185         m_PI = new float [ m_numberStates ];
01186         for( unsigned int i=0; i<m_numberStates; i++ )
01187         {
01188                 file >> m_PI[ i ];
01189         } 
01190 
01191         // Skip file info
01192         file.getline( str, 100, '\n' ); // EOL
01193         file.getline( str, 100, '\n' ); // empty line
01194         file.getline( str, 100, '\n' ); // A info
01195 
01196         // A
01197         m_A = new float* [ m_numberStates ];
01198         for( unsigned int i=0; i<m_numberStates; i++ )
01199         {
01200                 m_A[i] = new float [ m_numberStates ];
01201                 for( unsigned int j=0; j<m_numberStates; j++ )
01202                 {
01203                         file >> m_A[ i ][ j ] ;
01204                 }
01205         } 
01206         
01207         // Skip file info
01208         file.getline( str, 100, '\n' ); // EOL
01209         file.getline( str, 100, '\n' ); // empty line
01210         file.getline( str, 100, '\n' ); // B info
01211 
01212         // B
01213         m_B = new float* [ m_numberStates ];
01214         for( unsigned int i=0; i<m_numberStates; i++ )
01215         {
01216                 m_B[i] = new float [ m_vocabularySize ];
01217                 for( unsigned int j=0; j<m_vocabularySize; j++ )
01218                 {
01219                         file >> m_B[ i ][ j ] ;
01220                 }
01221         } 
01222         file.getline( str, 100, '\n' ); // Empty line
01223 
01224         return true;
01225 }

01228 
01232 bool cHMM::saveASCII( std::ofstream& file ) const
01233 {
01234         if( file.is_open() == false ) {
01235                 return false;
01236         }
01237 
01238         // File informations
01239         file << "ASCII HMM File version " << AGR_HMM_ASCII_FILE_VERSION << std::endl;
01240         file << "Created with AGR v" << AGR_VERSION << "." << AGR_VERSION_MIN << std::endl;
01241         file << std::endl;
01242         
01243         // HMM informations
01244         file << "nbState " << m_numberStates << std::endl;
01245         file << "observationSize " << m_observationSize << std::endl;
01246         file << "Mean " << m_meanProbabilityWeighted << std::endl;
01247         file << "Variance " << m_varianceProbabilityWeighted << std::endl;
01248         file << std::endl;
01249 
01250         // Vocabulary information
01251         file << "Size of the vocabulary used : " << m_ptVocabulary->getSize() << std::endl;
01252         file << std::endl;
01253 
01254         // PI
01255         file << "PI : Initial probability distribution, size = " << m_numberStates << std::endl;
01256         for( unsigned int i=0; i<m_numberStates; i++ )
01257         {
01258                 file << m_PI[ i ] << " ";
01259         } 
01260         file << std::endl;
01261         file << std::endl;
01262 
01263         // A
01264         file << "A : transition probability matrix, size = " << m_numberStates << " * " << m_numberStates << std::endl;
01265         for( unsigned int i=0; i<m_numberStates; i++ )
01266         {
01267                 for( unsigned int j=0; j<m_numberStates; j++ )
01268                 {
01269                         file << m_A[ i ][ j ] << " ";
01270                 }
01271                 file << std::endl;
01272         } 
01273         file << std::endl;
01274 
01275         // B
01276         file << "B : Emission probability matrix, size = " << m_numberStates << " * " <<  m_ptVocabulary->getSize() << std::endl;
01277         for( unsigned int i=0; i<m_numberStates; i++ )
01278         {
01279                 for( unsigned int j=0; j<m_ptVocabulary->getSize(); j++ )
01280                 {
01281                         file << m_B[ i ][ j ] << " ";
01282                 }
01283                 file << std::endl;
01284         } 
01285 
01286         return true;
01287 }

01290 
01295 bool cHMM::loadBinary( std::ifstream& file )
01296 {       
01297         if( file.is_open() == false ) {
01298                 return false;
01299         }
01300 
01301         {       // Binary header
01302                 char buffer[3];
01303                 if( !file.read( buffer, 3 ) ) {
01304                         return false;
01305                 }
01306 
01307                 // Check header
01308                 if( 0 != memcmp( buffer, AGR_HMM_BIN_FILE_HEADER, 3 ) ) {
01309                         return false;
01310                 }
01311         }
01312 
01313         {// Version
01314                 unsigned int version;
01315                 if( !file.read( (char*)(&version), sizeof(version) ) ) {
01316                         return false;
01317                 }
01318 
01319                 // Check header
01320                 if( version != AGR_HMM_BINARY_FILE_VERSION ) {
01321                         return false;
01322                 }
01323         }
01324         
01325         //--------------------------    
01326         // clean current objects values
01327         // The previous vocabulary object pointed is saved and reassigned,
01328         // in case the user assigned the vocabulary object before loading the file
01329         const cVocabulary* prevVocabulary = m_ptVocabulary;
01330         clear();
01331         m_ptVocabulary = prevVocabulary;
01332 
01333         //--------------------------
01334         // Object informations 
01335 
01336         if(     !file.read( (char*)(&m_numberStates),                        sizeof(m_numberStates) )                           ||      // Nb states
01337                 !file.read( (char*)(&m_observationSize),                         sizeof(m_observationSize) )                    ||      // Observation size
01338                 !file.read( (char*)(&m_meanProbabilityWeighted),         sizeof(m_meanProbabilityWeighted) )    ||      // Mean probability
01339                 !file.read( (char*)(&m_varianceProbabilityWeighted), sizeof(m_varianceProbabilityWeighted))     ||      // Variance probability
01340                 !file.read( (char*)(&m_vocabularySize),                          sizeof(m_vocabularySize) )                             )       // Vocabulary size
01341         {
01342                 return false;
01343         }
01344 
01345         if( m_numberStates == 0         ||
01346                 m_vocabularySize == 0   )
01347         {
01348                 return false;
01349         }
01350 
01351         m_PI = new float  [ m_numberStates ];
01352         m_A  = new float* [ m_numberStates ];
01353         m_B  = new float* [ m_numberStates ];
01354         for( unsigned int i=0; i<m_numberStates; i++ )
01355         {
01356                 m_A[i] = new float [ m_numberStates ];
01357                 m_B[i] = new float [ m_vocabularySize ];
01358         }
01359 
01360         //--------------------------
01361         // HMM informations 
01362 
01363         //--------------------------
01364         // PI
01365         for( unsigned int i=0; i<m_numberStates; i++ )
01366         {
01367                 if( !file.read( (char*)(&m_PI[ i ]), sizeof(float) ) ){
01368                         return false;
01369                 }
01370         }
01371 
01372         //--------------------------
01373         // A
01374         for( unsigned int i=0; i<m_numberStates; i++ )
01375         {
01376                 for( unsigned int j=0; j<m_numberStates; j++ )
01377                 {
01378                         if( !file.read( (char*)(&m_A[ i ][ j ]), sizeof(float) ) ){
01379                                 return false;
01380                         }
01381                 }
01382         }
01383 
01384         //--------------------------
01385         // B
01386         for( unsigned int i=0; i<m_numberStates; i++ )
01387         {
01388                 for( unsigned int j=0; j<m_vocabularySize; j++ )
01389                 {
01390                         if( !file.read( (char*)(&m_B[ i ][ j ]), sizeof(float) ) ){
01391                                 return false;
01392                         }
01393                 }
01394         }
01395 
01396         return true;
01397 }
01398 
01399 
01400 
01405 bool cHMM::saveBinary( std::ofstream& file ) const
01406 {
01407         // Binary header
01408         file.write( AGR_HMM_BIN_FILE_HEADER, 3 );
01409 
01410         // Version
01411         file.write( (char*)(&AGR_HMM_BINARY_FILE_VERSION), sizeof(unsigned int) );
01412 
01413         //--------------------------
01414         // Object informations 
01415 
01416         // Nb states
01417         file.write( (char*)(&m_numberStates), sizeof(m_numberStates) );
01418         // Observation size
01419         file.write( (char*)(&m_observationSize), sizeof(m_observationSize) );
01420         // Mean probability
01421         file.write( (char*)(&m_meanProbabilityWeighted), sizeof(m_meanProbabilityWeighted) );
01422         // Variance probability
01423         file.write( (char*)(&m_varianceProbabilityWeighted), sizeof(m_varianceProbabilityWeighted) );
01424         // Vocabulary size
01425         file.write( (char*)(&m_vocabularySize), sizeof(m_vocabularySize) );
01426 
01427         //--------------------------
01428         // HMM informations 
01429 
01430         //--------------------------
01431         // PI
01432         for( unsigned int i=0; i<m_numberStates; i++ )
01433         {
01434                 file.write( (char*)(&m_PI[ i ]), sizeof(float) );
01435         }
01436 
01437         //--------------------------
01438         // A
01439         for( unsigned int i=0; i<m_numberStates; i++ )
01440         {
01441                 for( unsigned int j=0; j<m_numberStates; j++ )
01442                 {
01443                         file.write( (char*)(&m_A[ i ][ j ]), sizeof(float) );
01444                 }
01445         }
01446 
01447         //--------------------------
01448         // B
01449         for( unsigned int i=0; i<m_numberStates; i++ )
01450         {
01451                 for( unsigned int j=0; j<m_vocabularySize; j++ )
01452                 {
01453                         file.write( (char*)(&m_B[ i ][ j ]), sizeof(float) );
01454                 }
01455         }
01456 
01457         return true;
01458 }
